message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split, with me getting the larger share.  This way, we can both get a good amount, and I can make a more generous offer in the next round if you choose to reject.
Your offer was a bit too one-sided, Alice.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor this time.  Consider that the money will be worth less for both of us if we wait any longer, especially for you.
